summary: Based on a true story, the love affair between a Lithuanian genius Mikalojus Konstantinas Ciurlionis and Sofija, the woman he adored.
cast: Marija Korenkaite|Rokas Zubovas|Arturas Aleksejevas|Rugile Alytaite|Rimvydas Ambrazevicius|Nikolaj Antonov|Saulius Balandis|Andrius Bialobzeskis|Tomas Bimbiris|Rolandas Boravskis|Petras Ciurlionis|Dmitrijus Denisiukas|Nikolajus Elkana Eimutis|Romualdas Gudas|Janina Gudzineviciute-Radaitiene|Rytis Paulius Judkaitis|Edvard Keizik|Andzelika Kisin|Katazyna Kostygin|Valentinas Krulikovskis|Vita Kuprijanoviene|Liubomiras Laucevicius|Anupras Lauciunas|Evaldas Leskauskas|Aleksandr Lichaciov|Viaceslav Lukjanov|Vaidotas Martinaitis|Emilis Masiliunas|Aleksandra Metalnikova|Petras Mickunas|Karolis Nemeika|Maja Peliusenko|Martynas Ervinas Peteraitis|Vidas Petkevicius|Vitalis Purlys|Amile Reginyte|Monika Rimsaite|Katre Rizgelyte|Aleksandras Rubinovas|Vladimir Serov|Bozena Simonaviciute|Ramune Skardziunaite|Inesa Starkovska|Vera Stasenia|Gediminas Storpirstis|Agne Sunklodaite|Arturas Suziedelis|Nida Timinskaite|Darius Zdanovicius|Sarunas Zenkevicius
title: Laiskai Sofijai
